desc: We specialize in buying and selling high quality, new and used laboratory and pharmaceutical equipment.

layout.text: A Trusted Lab, Bio, Pharma Supplier

We specialize in buying and selling high quality, new and used laboratory and pharmaceutical equipment. Buy with confidence, your full satisfaction is guaranteed. Please contact us at (916) 462-4157 info@biolabsourcecompany.com with any questions or requests. We accept Paypal as a method of payment as well as any major credit card. If you would like to make a payment over the phone with a credit card, please send us a message with your contact info and we will give you a call right away. Thank you for your business.
